author: striker
msg: Merge a change from trunk, which was missed in r9247.
Issue 1794: recursive propset can corrupt the entries file
Justification: very hard for the user to recover

author: striker
msg: Merge some changes from trunk, remove them from STATUS.
Fix a SEGFAULT that occurs when trying to remotely delete the
Justification: Maybe you missed the part where I said, "SEGFAULT" ?
Fix issue #1786: mod_dav_svn accepts multiple authors, only records one.
Justification: without this fix, the author will be set to whomever was
authenticated on the MKACTIVITY request, which includes anonymous.
This would lead to (no author) commits, while most of the commit may
actually have an authenticated user associated with it.  Also, changes
of author during a single commit is prevented.
Issue 1802: use APR_EOL_STR endings to create runtime config files.
Justification: win32 users see junk when opening them in notepad.exe.
Notes:  Pretty embarrassing.  We got it right for README.txt already,
how did we forget the other files in ~/.subversion/?  :-)
